pageProduct.name: Plunkett Pure Aloe Vera 99% Spray 125ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Certifed organic Aloe Vera cooling spray. Soothes, cools and helps restore dry, damaged skin

Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera Spray is easily absorbed by your skin. The spray allows easy, convenient application without the need to touch sensitive, damaged skin. Aloe Vera is also known as "Nature's Medicine Plant" for its cooling, soothing & hydrating properties.

Suitable For: Suitable for use on sun and wind burn and other dry, problem, itchy irritated or damaged skin

Size: 125mL

KEY FEATURES

• Plunkett's 99% Pure Aloe Vera contains no addded water, alcohol, petroleum, parabens or artificial colours or fragrance. Plunkett's is 99% pure - the closest thing to cutting the fresh aloe vera plant! Certified organic, so there are no pesticides, chemicals, fertilizers or toxins.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid the eye area. Store below 30°

Ingredients

Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Cold Pressed Leaf Juice*, Organic Calendula* (Marigold) Extract, Allantoin*, Sodium Hydroxy Methylglycinate, Grapefruit Seed Extract* * Natural and/or Organic. Does not contain any artificial fragrance or colour

Active Ingredients: Active Ingredients: Certified Organic Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Cold Pressed Leaf Juice

Directions

Apply liberally as often as required. Suitable for use on all dry, problem, itchy, irritated or weather damaged skin, including sunburn and windburn.
